item.title: GoTo meetup recap - #GoTurns10 edition
item.description: The language that promised to make us programming again, Go, celebrated a milestone on November 2019. Marking 10 years since it was initially announced to the world: Hey! Ho! Let’s Go! Read more here from the official Go Blog: Go Turns 10 The Go Toronto meetup has been running on and off for many years since ~2013. Big shoutout, again, to Tim and Zach for keeping the lights on.
